testsuite.name: com.amazon.qa.testcases.AmazonAddToCartTests
testsuite.system-out: Screenshot Screenshot Amazon logo is displayed. Screenshot Entered product name. Screenshot Clicked on search button. Product Name on which clicked: realme narzo 60 5G (Mars Orange,8GB+128GB) 90Hz Super AMOLED Display | Ultra Premium Vegan Leather Design | with 33W SUPERVOOC Charger Screenshot Screenshot Screenshot Clicked on add to cart button. Screenshot Clicked on cart button. Screenshot Subtotal amount: 17,999.00 Number of products in cart: 1 The addition of amount of all the products in cart is same to subtotal amount is : 17,999.00
